Enter The Black Box

## üß© Overview
This project was specially created as a **test environment** to demonstrate and evaluate the capabilities of the LazyDeve agent ‚Äî including project synchronization, file management, code execution, and AI-assisted development workflows.

It serves as both a **functional ML robustness framework** and a **sandbox** for automated AI project control, showing how LazyDeve handles analysis, updates, and integration tasks.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Features
- Baseline training and evaluation of ML models (RandomForest, XGBoost)
- Adversarial mutation and drift simulation
- Drift detection using Evidently AI and Alibi Detect
- Explainability with SHAP

- Experiment tracking with MLflow
